pages.text: Fadenia is a species of Caseodont which lived during the Permian to Triassic periods. It was much smaller than its Carboniferous relative and they only grew to about 1.6-2 meters long and it had a tooth whorl similar to other caseodonts. It mainly inhabited marine environments and probably actively hunted.
